name: City Of Devil
description:
City of Devil is a 2D sidecrolling strategy game, inspired on Swords and Soldiers. You can face off against waves of robots who want to destroy your base, defend your base and destroy the enemy!

Features:

- History Mode.

- Duel Mode.

- Waves of Robots.

- Andddddddddddd many hours of Frustration!
